overview: America's top Christian comic Brad Stine offers you a guided tour through a whirlwind assembly of all his funniest comic moments in The Best of Brad Stine!  Join Brad in this 2-DVD collection of material from his past projects: Put A Helmet On, A Conservative Unleashed, Tolerate This, and Wussification. And for the first time, hear the stories behind the comedy, straight from Brad.
title: The Best of Brad Stine
